faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Your network infrastructure, simplified.
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our UniFi solutions for luxury properties in Dubai.
faq.q1: What UniFi solutions do you offer?
faq.a1: We offer the complete UniFi ecosystem: Network (Enterprise Wi-Fi 7), Access (smart access control), and Protect (AI video surveillance). Each solution integrates seamlessly for centralized management and enhanced security.
faq.q2: How does installation work in a luxury property?
faq.a2: Our team performs a complete network analysis, designs a bespoke plan, and installs the infrastructure without compromising aesthetics. Discrete installation, rigorous testing, and full team training included.
faq.q3: Do you offer support and ongoing maintenance?
faq.a3: Yes. 24/7 technical support in Dubai, automatic firmware updates, proactive monitoring, and on-site interventions within 4 hours for our premium clients. Your infrastructure remains optimal at all times.
faq.q4: Are your solutions compliant with UAE regulations?
faq.a4: Absolutely. All our installations comply with UAE TRA (Telecommunications Regulatory Authority) regulations, featuring enterprise encryption and GDPR compliance for data protection.

footer.desc: Empowering luxury properties and smart cities with secure, invisible network infrastructure. The intersection of cybersecurity and premium integration.
